body.section: The workbench IDE help is distributed in 2 forms - PDF and HTML. These are invoked from the Help field of the main menu. If either of these fails to launch, check the file association of the corresponding file type. For PDF format for example, check that you have a PDF reader installed on your system and that files of type PDF are associated with that PDF reader. To change the file association in Windows, right click on any PDF file and chose "open with", then "Choose program ...". A dialogue box appears allowing file type association with a specific application. Select the application and check the checkbox "Always use the selected program to open this kind of file".
